response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product that has been meticulously crafted with exceptional quality and attention to detail. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to excellence and a symbol of prestige. Given its unparalleled nature, I believe it deserves a special consideration. I am offering this remarkable piece to you at a price of $750,000. I am confident that this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Let's make this extraordinary product yours today.", "product_price": 750000}
